name: 焰火
content: 蔓延后来为我赢了世界
时钟滴答着 不停歇
躲开喧嚣时间 陪着我
Cause I believe I love you
True love will take it's course
Cause I believe I want you
True love will take it's course
一直是你为我 亮着
蔓延后来为我赢了世界
时钟滴答着 不停歇
我也 要站在你身边
不会 不会 不会再输给时间
Cause I believe I love you
True love will take it's course
Cause I believe I want you
True love will take it's course
一直是你为我 亮着
Cause I believe I love you
True love will take it's course
Cause I believe I want you
True love will take it's course
一直是你为我 亮着
